text: Thomas Michael Bond OBE (13 January 1926 - 27 June 2017) was an English author. He was best known for his Paddington Bear series of books. Bond was awarded a OBE in the Queen's Birthday Honours 2015."Birthday Honours 2015", BBC News, 13 June 2015 Bond died on 27 June 2017 at his London home from a short-illness at the age of 91.Michael Bond, Paddington Bear Creator, Is Dead at 91 The New York Times, June 28, 2017 ==References== ==Other websites== * Michael Bond Biography * Paddington Bear â€“ The Official Website * The Herbs Category:1926 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in London Category:English children's writers Category:Writers from Berkshire
